memberdef.argsstring: (BRect frame, const char *name, const char *label, BMessage *message, bool fixed, uint32 resizeMask=B_FOLLOW_LEFT_TOP, uint32 flags=B_WILL_DRAW)
memberdef.name: BOptionPopUp

memberdef.argsstring: (BRect frame, const char *name, const char *label, BMessage *message, uint32 resizeMask=B_FOLLOW_LEFT_TOP, uint32 flags=B_WILL_DRAW)
memberdef.name: BOptionPopUp

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *name, const char *label, BMessage *message, uint32 flags=B_WILL_DRAW)
memberdef.name: BOptionPopUp

briefdescription.para: Add an option to the menu.

detaileddescription.para: Note that the option value is independent from its position in the menu.

briefdescription.para: Similar to AttachedToWindow() but this method is triggered after all child views have already been detached from a window.
Hook method called when the control is attached to a window.

detaileddescription.para: This method overrides BView::AttachedToWindow() setting the low color and view color of the BControl so that it matches the view color of the control's parent view. It also makes the attached window the default target for Invoke() as long as another target has not already been set.

briefdescription.para: Fill out the preferred width and height of the control into the _width and _height parameters.

detaileddescription.para: Derived classes can override this method to set the preferred width and height of the control.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a float to hold the width of the control.
Pointer to a float to hold the height of the control.

briefdescription.para: Remove option at given index from the menu.
Resize the control to its preferred size.
Get the label and/or value of the currently selected option.

detaileddescription.para: BControl objects are enabled by default. If the control changes enabled state then it is redrawn.
Disabled controls generally won't allow the user to focus on them (The B_NAVIGABLE flag is turned off), and don't post any messages.
Disabled controls in derived classes should be drawn in subdued colors to visually indicate that they are disabled and should not respond to keyboard or mouse events.

parameterdescription.para: If true enables the control, if false, disables it.

briefdescription.para: Sets the label of the control.

detaileddescription.para: If the label changes the control is redrawn.

parameterdescription.para: The label to set, can be NULL.

briefdescription.para: Sets the value of the control.

detaileddescription.para: If the value changes the control is redrawn.
This class is a wrapper around BMenuField that implements BControl semantics. Each menu item holds a value, which is used as the control value when that item is selected.
The menu is populated using the AddOptionAt() method, giving the label and value for each option. It is set to radio mode by default.
